name: Catatonic (Cynichill)
description:
Catatonic is a game about raising a cat (apparently into an eldritch abomination..).

This was a project brought to life by myself, Logan Campbell (Cynichill) and Ryan Leung (PurpleBard).

This project was made for our games engineering course, and had a small scope, however we are quite happy with how it turned out considering our limitations.

CATJAM.
